input: Pending the time she would finally pack and go, everybody should be content with eating just anything.
target: Títí di ìgbà tí ó máa fi kó ẹrù rẹ̀ lọ pátápátá, kí oníkálùkù ní ìtẹ́lọ̀rùn pẹ̀lú ohunkóhun tó bá rí jẹ.

input: She knew how best she was going to take care of herself and Tinu.
target: Ó mọ bí ó ṣe má a tọ́jú ara rẹ̀ àti Tinú.

input: Alamu Should learn to look after himself.
target: Kí Àlàmú kọ́ bí ó ṣe máa tọ́jú ara rẹ̀.

input: His old Mama should not come back again and be given the chance to snap and make any further wicked insinuations.
target: Kí ìyá rẹ̀ má tún padà wá láti máa jágbe kí ó sì pòwe ìkà kankan.

input: Now it was going to be everybody for himself, God for us all.
target: Báyìí, ó ti di kí olórí dorí ẹ̀ mú, kí oníkálùkù wà fún ra ara rẹ̀, Ọlọ́run wà fún gbogbo wa.

input: Labake assumed a na him sabi posture and found herself suddenly in high spirits, she sang in high pitch, her voice rang like a bell.
target: Làbákẹ́ ń ṣe ìṣe òun ló mọ̀ ọkàn rẹ̀ déédé gbé sókè láti kọ orin rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú ohùn òkè, ohùn rẹ̀ dún bí i agogo.

input: Her countenance was gay.
target: Ìrísí rẹ̀ fi inú dídùn rẹ̀ hàn.

input: She told herself she had no problem.
target: Ó sọ fún ara rẹ̀ pé òun kò ní ìṣòro kankan.

input: Nothing to worry about.
target: Kò ní nǹkankan láti dààmú fún.

input: No woman on earth in the whole wide world was ever as happy as she was.
target: Kò sí obìnrin náà lórí ilẹ̀ ní gbogbo ayé tí inú rẹ̀ dún tó bí inú rẹ̀ ṣe dùn.

input: Why should she not be happy
target: Kí ló ṣe tí inú rẹ̀ kò ní dún

input: Her days were numbered in Alamu's house.
target: Ọjọ́ rẹ̀ ti níye nínú ilé Àlàmú.

input: The days of sorrow and tribulations were numbered.
target: Ọjọ́ ìbànújẹ́ àti wàhálà rẹ̀ ti níye.

input: The divorce suit was well on the way, she'd almost finished packing her things.
target: Ẹjọ́ ìkọ̀sílẹ̀ ti wà lọ́nà, òun náà ti fẹ́rẹ̀ ẹ́ palẹ̀mọ́ àwọn nǹkan rẹ̀ tán.

input: Tinu gave her no problem, the little girl was full of life and spirit, she herself had been blessed with good health.
target: Tinú ò sì fún un ní wàhálà kankan, ọmọbìnrin kékeré náà kúnfún ìyè, ẹ̀mí àlàáfìà tó péye ni Ọlọ́run fi jíǹkí òun fún ara rẹ̀.

input: In spite of the difficult period at home she'd maintained her pretty look, her elegant posture.
target: Ládúrú ìnira tó wà nílẹ̀ ó sì rẹ̀wà síbẹ̀, ìdúró rẹ̀ dún síbẹ̀.

input: Nobody seeing her would ever think she was a woman with problems.
target: Kò sí ẹni tó má ri tá sọ pé obìnrin tó ní ìṣòro ni.

input: With her present girlish shape and figure, she could go back to England and re-enter the glamorous world of fashion.
target: Pẹ̀lú ìrísí omidan tí ó ní lọ́wọ́ lọ́wọ́ yìí, ó lè padà sí England kí ó sì tún padà sí àyè oge síse ẹ̀.

input: She would need only three or four months tuning up and reconditioning her body, then catch up finally.
target: Á kàn nílò láti tún ara rẹ̀ ṣe fún bí oṣù mẹ́ta sí mẹ́rin, á padà sípò.

input: So no regrets, she sang hilariously, she clapped her hands, she danced.
target: Fún ìdí èyí, kò sí àbámọ̀, ó rẹ́rìn-ín tàríyá-tàríyá, ó palẹ̀mọ̀, ó jó.

input: Labake straightened her back and threw out her chest, arms swung freely, her feet marked time left, right, left right, she was sweating
target: Làbákẹ́ na ẹ̀yìn, ó sì ti àyà sí wájú, ó jupá láìsídìíwọ́, ó ń gbé ẹsẹ̀ sósì sọ́tùn-ún, sọ́tùn-ún sósì, ó ń làágùn

input: But wait.what really was happening
target: Ṣùgbọ́n dúró ná ó .kí gan-an ló ń sẹlẹ̀

input: Labake stopped briefly to ask herself.
target: Làbákẹ́ dúró díẹ̀ láti bi ara rẹ̀ ní èyí.

input: She held her breath minute, pondering.
target: Ó sé èémí fún ìṣẹ́jú kan, ó ń wòye.

input: Why all this show of excitement and intoxication
target: Kíni ìdí fún gbogbo àfihàn ìdùnnú àti ìyírí yìí

input: Was she going mad Was she going crazy too
target: Ṣe òun ti ń ya wèrè Ṣe òun náà ti ń ya wèrè ni

input: No, No, she answered herself.No.
target: Rárá, Rárá o, ó dá ará rẹ̀ lóhùn .Rárá.

input: It was Alamu going mad, it was Alamu who had infact, gone mad.
target: Àlàmú ló ń sínwín, kódà, Àlàmú ló tí ya wèrè.

input: Not her .Not her
target: Kìí ṣe òun .kì í ṣe òun

input: Before God and man
target: Níwájú Ọlọ́run àti ènìyàn
